appetizers.name: Bloomed Onions
appetizers.description: Each petal of our of our Bloomed Onions features a flavorful, tender onion slice, coated in spicey breading, deepfried to perfection for a crispy yummy crust! Served with your choice of three dipping sauces.

appetizers.name: Deep Fried Pickles
appetizers.description: Every single one of our Deep Fried Pickles are battered in a colletion of delicious spices & fried to absolute perfection! Served with your choice of dipping sauces.

appetizers.name: Mozzar-Ella Sticks
appetizers.description: Our Mozzar-Ella Stick breading is created with a special mix of unique spices, creating an appetizer that's delicious enough on it's own, no need for dipping sauces! No bland breading here! But if you'd like, you've got your choice of any two from the menu.

cold-sandwiches.name: Caesar Salad Wraps
cold-sandwiches.description: Who doesn't love a nice Caesar salad? Or a nice lunch wrap? Well how about the two together? Our tortilla shells are hand made, as is our Caesar salad dressing.

cold-sandwiches.name: BLT
cold-sandwiches.description: You've had the rest, now try the best sizzling BLT there is!

hot-sandwiches.name: That's Crazy Bologna! Sub
hot-sandwiches.description: I'm sure you've heard the saying 'Now that's CRAZY BOLOGNA!!!'... Well, CRAZY BOLOGNA exists & it's called PEPPERONI, & we've made a delicious sandwich out of it!

hot-sandwiches.name: Philly's Wife's Cheese Steak Sandwich
hot-sandwiches.description: You've had a Philly Cheese Steak Sandwich, now try Philly's Wife's! It's cheesier & packed with more flavorful steak strips than any other!

desserts.name: Bannana-Rama Split
desserts.description: Give in to your sweet tooth today with our handmade ice cream with not one- but TWO Bananas! Coated in hot fudge, chocolate chips, topped with a delectible ruby-red cherry.

desserts.name: Because... Root Beer Floats!!!
desserts.description: A Sailor once told me a story... That a Pirate forced him to walk the plank while he was enjoying his favorite dessert, & that he'd have drown if it hadn't been for one thing... ROOT BEER FLOATS!

desserts.name: 99% Angel-food Cake
desserts.description: Try our 99% Angel-food Cake! Moist, spongey cake beneath a coating of whipped cream & fresh strawberries with just a drizzle of chocolate.

drinks.name: Icey Cold Soda
drinks.description: Please choose from our wide selection of carbonated beverages. Don't worry, we offer FREE refills!

drinks.name: Coffee
drinks.description: Please choose from our wide selection of hot, caffeinated beverages. FREE refills on plain coffee!

drinks.name: Adult Beverages
drinks.description: Please choose from our wide selection of adult beverages. Half off on Beer on Saturdays!
